CustomField.description: Question Created by the Survey Builder
CustomField.inlineHelpText: I understand for integration to work properly, all of Ubiquity's required data fields must be entered into my payroll system. I agree to use the deduction names/fields above when processing payroll and understand we will only collect this data. If I deviate from my payroll schedule or deduction codes above, I will contact my Payroll Koncierge before my payroll is processed.
CustomField.label: Field naming convention integrity
